item.title: WIRED’s Best E-Readers, Tested and Reviewed (2025): Kindle, Kobo, Boox
item.description: These WIRED-tested ebook readers let you take your library anywhere.

item.title: Kindle Colorsoft Kids Review (2025): Great for All Ages
item.description: Amazon’s color Kindle now comes in a version made for kids, giving you colorful books for all ages and a full year of Amazon Kids+ content.

item.title: PopSocket PopCase Kindle Hands-On (2025): Easy Reading
item.description: No more DIY additions to get a PopSocket on your Kindle: The PopCase Kindle makes it easy to add any grip onto the case’s built-in MagSafe ring.

item.title: The Kindle Colorsoft Just Got Two More Models
item.description: There’s now a Kindle Colorsoft Kids, plus a cheaper, 16GB version of the main Colorsoft.
